Scripts.OnLoad:
self.text:SetText(MINIMUM) self.text:SetParent(self:GetParent().DurationMinEnabled) -- This is evil and lazy. So, so lazy. self.text:SetPoint("LEFT", 2, 0) self.text:SetPoint("RIGHT", self)
TMW.IE:CreateSettingFrameFromData(self, { setting = "DurationMin", title = MINIMUM, tooltip = TMW.L["ICONMENU_DURATION_MIN_DESC"], disabled = function(self) return not TMW.CI.ics.DurationMinEnabled end, ModifySettingValue = function(self, value) return tonumber(value) or 0 end, })

self.text:SetText(MAXIMUM) self.text:SetParent(self:GetParent().DurationMaxEnabled) -- This is evil and lazy. So, so lazy. self.text:SetPoint("LEFT", 2, 0) self.text:SetPoint("RIGHT", self)
TMW.IE:CreateSettingFrameFromData(self, { setting = "DurationMax", title = MAXIMUM, tooltip = TMW.L["ICONMENU_DURATION_MIN_DESC"], disabled = function(self) return not TMW.CI.ics.DurationMaxEnabled end, ModifySettingValue = function(self, value) return tonumber(value) or 0 end, })

self.text:SetWidth(self:GetWidth())
TMW.IE:CreateSettingFrameFromData(self, "SettingSlider_Alpha", { title = TMW.L["REQFAILED_ALPHA"], tooltip = TMW.L["DURATIONALPHA_DESC"], setting = "DurationAlpha", setOrangeAtValue = 1, disabled = function(self) local ics = TMW.CI.ics if ics then return not ics.DurationMinEnabled and not ics.DurationMaxEnabled end end, })
